thread.title: Father of House Majority Whip Steve Scalise dies at age of 77
thread.title_full: Father of House Majority Whip Steve Scalise dies at age of 77

title: Father of House Majority Whip Steve Scalise dies at age of 77
text:
Father of House Majority Whip Steve Scalise dies at age of 77 Father of House Majority Whip Steve Scalise dies at age of 77 capitol news bureau 
Alfred J. “Al” Scalise, the father of House Majority Whip Steve Scalise, has died in Metairie, according to a family friend. 
He had been ill. 
A native of New Orleans Scalise had been in the restaurant business in Florida before returning to the New Orleans where he sold real estate for Keller Williams Realty. 
The family asked for privacy and will issue an obituary soon. More On This Topic
